channel.title: Flight Safety on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Flight Safety on FinanClub

item.title: LUV
item.description: score:12 Chances: Despite the incident, the large number of daily flights that operate without incident indicates the incident may not significantly impact short-term outlook for Southwest’s stock. Demand for airline travel is expected to recover for the summer months, potentially benefiting Southwest and other airline stocks.
